scripts.dev: supabase start && npm run generate-env && concurrently -c 'magenta,green'  --kill-others-on-fail 'npm:*:dev'
scripts.generate-env: npx supabase status | awk '/API URL:/ {api_url=$3} /anon key:/ {anon_key=$3} END {print "REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL=\"" api_url "\"" > ".env"; print "REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=\"" anon_key "\"" >> ".env"}'
